item.description:
Come Join me for the 7th Annual Rock n' Rib Fest for great food and entertainment on the beautiful and spacious grounds of Anheuser-Busch. This family-oriented event will feature nationally renowned professional ?ribbers? and local award-winning restaurants providing mouth-watering ribs for everyone to enjoy. Add great entertainment for and you have a recipe for fun and excitement. As the official New Hampshire State Barbecue Championships, you will experience some of the best grillers and BBQers in the northeast vying for title of New Hampshire Barbecue Grand Champion.

http://www.rotaryribf...

Entertainment:

FRIDAY - JUNE 19th

Teen Band Competition 4:00 PM - 8:00 PM

The Risen - Rock 'n' Roll 8:00 PM - 11:00 PM

SATURDAY - JUNE 20th

One Fine Mess - Rock 'n' Roll 12:00 PM - 2:30 PM

Brickyard Blues - Rock 'n' Roll 3:00 PM - 6:00 PM

The James Montgomery Band (Special guest - J. Geils) - Blues/Rock 6:30 PM - 8:30 PM

Jimmy's Down - Rock 'n' Roll 9:00 PM - 11:00 PM

SUNDAY - JUNE 21st

Double Yellow - Rock 'n' Roll 11:00 AM - 11:30 AM

Mama Kicks - Rock 12:00 PM - 3:00 PM

http://rotaryribfest....

2009 Ribbers:

T-Roy's Barbecue - Amherst, NH - 2007 People's Choice winner

Gator BBQ â€“ Ontario, Canada

Stickyfingers - Providence, RI

Aussom Aussie BBQ - Pittsburgh, PA - 2008 People's Choice Winner

Dave's Famous Bar-B-Que - Manchester, NH

Rasta Joe's BBQ - Plymouth, IN

Smoken' Dudes Smokehouse - Bensalem, PA - 2005 People's Choice winner

Big Moe's M&M Ribs - Quincy, MA - 2006 People's Choice winner

http://rotaryribfest....

Cost:
$5; Children under 16 are free

Carpool location:

We will meet at the Nashua Rest Area and welcome center at exit 6 in Nashua. Look for Robert.
item.name: Rock'N Rib Fest, Anheuser-Busch
